WE THE PEOPLE

Stand Up Counties

We are a grassroots organic movement of We The People of Michigan whose vision is to reclaim and defend the rights and liberties of Michiganders. Our Mission is to equip and empower We The People to stand up for sacred values, citizen rights and constitutionally-protected freedoms.

Our Mission

Stand Up Michigan

We are a grassroots organic movement of We The People of Michigan whose vision is to reclaim and defend the rights and liberties of Michiganders. Our Mission is to equip and empower We The People to stand up for sacred values, citizen rights and constitutionally-protected freedoms.
